notes: Rendered paraphyletic by Enterosora_barbatula (in part) but no combination available [@Bauret2017]
Prosaptia_nutans is outlier but not sure if due to misID or taxonomy
Calymmodon_curtus is outlier but not sure if due to misID or taxonomy
Polypodium_ensiforme needs to be made Pleopeltis but no combination available
Outlier Christella_euphlebia could be synonymized to Pronephrium_articulatum, but not sister to the only other Pronephrium, Pronephrium_aoristisorum
Rendered paraphyletic by Chingia, but sister in @Fawcett2021a
Grypothrix_cuspidata and Grypothrix_ramosii are outliers; other four are monophyletic
Rendered paraphyletic by Pakau, but close in @Fawcett2021a
Steiropteris_pennellii is outlier, but not clear if mis-ID or due to taxonomy
Outlier Oceaniopteris_gibba in small clade with Doodia_maxima, Neoblechnum_brasiliense
Parablechnum_lineatum in Doodia, leave for now; Doodia_maxima showing up outside of Doodia
Includes Dennstaedtia flaccida MT657694; could be mis-ID, but not sure
pteridocat does not yet fully recognize Gymnosphaera, so a few taxa with no synonyms in Alsophila are currently rendering Alsophila paraphyletic
Alsophila_crenulata should be Sphaeropteris but no combination available
Includes nothogenus Osmunasium between Plenasium and Osmunda
Rendered paraphyletic by Baja; conflicts with @George2019, who found Baja sister to remaining Bommeria
action: Investigate Baja relative to other Bommeria
